title: Disgusting behavior from OPL player in Solo Queue
body:
First of all, this player claims to be a member of Ardent Frost. I checked his summoner profile and he is indeed a member of "Ardent Frost Temp", but I am yet to find any confirmation that this is the official Ardent team. Anyway, assuming so...

His behavior was pretty appalling, he was making extremely rude comments in game and in the post-game chat, I added him asked him if he'd like to 1v1, at which point he said this.

Just wanted to warn fellow solo queue players, and also the Ardent team, that this is how one of your players behaves when he thinks nobody is looking.

(posted from my smurf, Sinai is my main).
